projects.name: Trident Hills
projects.location: Sector 4, Pinjore-Kalka Urban Complex, Panchkula, Haryana 134102
projects.description: Trident Hills is a 200-acre premium integrated township nestled at the foothills of the Shivalik Hills, offering residential plots, premium floors, villas, and commercial spaces with world-class lifestyle amenities.
projects.overview: Welcome to Trident Hills — a 200-acre township designed for privileged living surrounded by the natural beauty of the Shivaliks. Strategically located on the Zirakpur-Kalka Highway (NH-5) in Pinjore, Panchkula, this gated community offers lush green surroundings, a state-of-the-art clubhouse 'The Azaleas', landscaped open areas, and a congestion-free environment. Developed by Trident Realty, this township is future-ready, backed by world-class infrastructure and promising high investment potential.
locationHighlights: IT Parks of Panchkula, Chandigarh & Mohali within 14-26 km
Close to Hospitals: Paras (8 km), Alchemist (10 km), PGI (24 km)
Elante Mall - 18 km, DT Mall - 25 km
Panchkula Golf Club (12 km), Chandigarh Golf Club (18 km)
Morni Hills (26 km), Sukhna Lake (20 km), Wildlife Reserves nearby

faqs.question: What is Trident Hills?
faqs.answer: Trident Hills is a 200-acre integrated residential township located in Pinjore, Panchkula at the foothills of the Shivalik range.

faqs.question: What does Trident Hills offer?
faqs.answer: It offers residential plots, low-rise premium floors, villas, group housing, and commercial spaces.

faqs.question: Where is Trident Hills located?
faqs.answer: It is situated in Sector 4, Pinjore-Kalka Urban Complex, Panchkula, Haryana 134102.

faqs.question: What are the project amenities?
faqs.answer: Amenities include green landscapes, clubhouse, herb gardens, car charging points, smart street lights, command center, CCTV, medical and educational facilities, power backup, and amphitheatre.

faqs.question: What makes Trident Hills unique?
faqs.answer: Its scenic location at the foothills of the Shivaliks, 200-acre scale, future-ready infrastructure, and lush green surroundings make it stand out.

faqs.question: What is available inside the clubhouse?
faqs.answer: The Azaleas clubhouse includes banquet, bars, cafes, gaming zones, indoor sports, gym, spa, yoga studio, kids activity zones, and even a private screening theatre.

faqs.question: What are the locational advantages?
faqs.answer: Excellent connectivity to Chandigarh, Mohali, Shimla; proximity to hospitals, schools, malls, and IT hubs; located on NH-5.

faqs.question: What is the starting price?
faqs.answer: Residential plots start from ₹1.08 Cr onwards. Floors start from ₹2.52 Cr.

faqs.question: Are there flexible payment plans?
faqs.answer: Yes. Time & Development Linked Plans and Down Payment Plans are available.

faqs.question: What is the possession date?
faqs.answer: Possession has already started, depending on phase and unit type.

faqs.question: Which banks are offering home loans?
faqs.answer: Banks like HDFC, SBI, LIC Housing Finance, and Bajaj Finance are supporting the project.

reviews.name: Sandeep Verma
reviews.comment: Amazing location and concept. The idea of a full township with all facilities is very promising. Booked a plot.

reviews.name: Neha Gupta
reviews.comment: The sample floors look great. The construction quality seems top-notch. Eagerly waiting for possession.

contactInfo.address: Site Office, Trident Hills, Sector 4, Pinjore-Kalka Urban Complex, Panchkula, Haryana 134102

projects.name: Trident Panipat
projects.description: An exclusive gated community offering premium residential plots and luxury villas with modern amenities in Panipat.
projects.overview: Trident Panipat is a new benchmark for luxury living in the heart of Panipat. This upcoming gated community is designed to offer a secure and upscale lifestyle with its offering of residential plots and lavish 4 & 5 BHK villas. With a focus on quality construction, thoughtful design, and essential amenities, Trident Panipat aims to be the most sought-after address for families looking for a modern and comfortable home.
locationHighlights: Located in the developing Sector 18 of Panipat
Close to major industrial hubs like Panipat Refinery & NFL
Easy access to hospitals, banks, and markets

faqs.question: What is the starting price at Trident Panipat?
faqs.answer: Trident Panipat offers residential plots starting from approximately ₹80 Lakhs.

faqs.question: Is this a good investment?
faqs.answer: Being a new launch in a prime, developing sector of Panipat with modern amenities, it holds strong potential for appreciation and is considered a good investment opportunity.

faqs.question: What configurations are available?
faqs.answer: The project offers residential plots of various sizes, along with options for 4 and 5 BHK luxury villas.

contactInfo.address: Site Office, Sector 18, Near GT Road, Panipat, Haryana 132103
